entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `ConcurrentStack<T>.TryPopRange` does not throw `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` when `startIndex` equals the length of `items` #108577

Closed

  • PipeReaderStream throws when the read buffer is smaller than the examined length #107213

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid spilling loads of static readonly variables #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use the managed codec for basic constraints and remove entire X.509 extension PAL #108578

Merged

  • Allow un-examining in PipeReader.AdvanceTo(...) #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Share pthread_setname via minipal #108370
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108535
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108562
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108563
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • Move more helpers from DomainAssembly to Assembly #108568
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid `OverflowException` in `Boolean.TryFormat` #108572
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Optimize Memmove unrolling for constant src #108576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • LINQ GroupBy Grouping can use InlineArray for first elements to avoid allocations #108569
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Add FromFile to BinaryData #107231
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add CreateChained to RateLimiter #107230
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on Char and Rune #105773
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet nuget package list -- error: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'path') #43936
  • `dotnet add package` does not report vulnerablities #43935
  • Error: The type or namespace name 'HttpClient' could not be found in projects using net472 when net8 is installed. #43932
  • dotnet format for very large codebases #43930

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] [Containers] Fix parsing and error reporting of ports that lack port type metadata #43933
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • When updating workload versions, don't try to update to an older version, or to the same version currently installed #43931
  • dotnet-format: Support hidden severity for analyzers and code fixes #43929
    untriaged, Area-Format

Merged

  • [Containers] Fix parsing and error reporting of ports that lack port type metadata #43551
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for Aspire #43884
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2553893 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • 0x80070005 #25109
  • Documented VisualStateManager Button/Entry examples throws an exception #25069
  • [MISSING DEPRECATION] Non-firing function overrides like OnMeasure and OnAppearing should be marked as deprecated #21543
    Backlog

Updated

  • [net9.0] Blazor MAUI App hangs during back navigation because of disconnect code #24407
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Grouped CollectionView lazy loading does not trigger [RemainingItemsThresholdReached] on iOS and Windows #10078
    Backlog
  • Fonts/images/assets in a custom MAUI NuGet package not found #19804
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] CollectionView has default native PointerOver state which cannot be removed #13197
    Backlog
  • Fail to compile MAUI Blazor Android only in Release build when there is a file starting with dot (.) in wwwroot folder #22882

PullRequests

Created

  • Move all Bugzilla tests to subfolder #25111
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [iOS] Changed UIImageRenderingMode for buttons #25107
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button

Updated

  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24944
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • First tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24943
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Remove excessive DataTemplateSelector API comments #25105
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
